title: AssignClass (Method)
text:
METHOD AssignClass :
Error
Issue an assign class request

rows.Name: classMask
rows.Comment:
class to assign group to. This puts a Class Object Header (COH)in a request and all Data Object Headers (DOH) immediately following that
are assigned to that class.

rows: address qualfier, must be all or 8/16 bit start/stopor 8/16 bit limited quantity or 8/16 bit indexed
start if qualifier is 8/16 bit start/stop
stop if qualifier is 8/16 bit start/stop or quantityif qualifier is 8/16 bit limited quantity

pointer to array of point numbers to read if 8/16 bit
indexed
